x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Many schools and colleges struggle with fragmented communication between students, mentors, and administrators. Students often don’t know where to report issues, provide feedback, or seek guidance, and administrators lack a centralized platform to manage student engagement and support efficiently.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: CampusConnect – Centralized Student Engagement & Issue Reporting
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Service Portal – for the student-facing submission and dashboard interface.
  • Flow Designer – to automate routing, notifications, and escalations.
  • Now Assist (AI chatbot) – to provide guidance and answer FAQs.
  • Performance Analytics – to measure engagement, resolution times, and recurring issues.
  • IntegrationHub – to connect with LMS, email, or messaging platforms.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Student and staff user directories (LDAP/SSO integration) for authentication.
  • Access to learning management systems or other educational platforms for integration.
  • Existing communication channels (email, Teams, SMS) for notifications.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring proper data privacy and compliance with student data regulations.
  • Coordinating multiple departments and mentors to adopt the platform.
  • Training students and staff to use the portal effectively.
  • Integrating with legacy educational platforms that may not have APIs.
